description:
Tatsuma’s early days at Magami High were tough. He faced the class delinquent, took on the Wrestling Club captain, and then he and his new friends had to battle a demon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Encounter with Lamentation Beneath the Cherry Blossoms
Sakura Shita Haru En no Souguu
Spotkanie z rozpaczą wśród kwitnących drzew wiśni
外法編 第弐夜「桜下春怨の遭遇」
